label: LegalOrganization
comment: An organization set up on a legal basis as a business, government body, department, charity, or financial institution.

objectProperties.comment: A legal registration authorized for this legally set up organization.
A code specifying the type of business of this legally set up organization.
A unique identifier of the district area regarded as a geographic or administrative unit within which this legally set up organization operates.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value when this legally set up organization was established.
A unique identifier for this legally set up organization.
The code specifying the legal classification of this organization, such as Incorporated (Inc), Limited Liability Corporation (LLC) or non-profit.
A name, expressed as text, of this legally set up organization.
A postal address for this legally set up organization.
The trading business name, expressed as text, of this legally set up organization.
A code specifying a type of legally set up organization.

referencedBy.comment: The legally constituted organization specified for this trade party.
